test.name: Test3

kw.name: Test Setup
kw.doc: test setup You can define the Setup variable with a keyword for setting up all your tests. You can define the ${TEST_137_SETUP} variable with a keyword for setting up this specific test. If both are defined, ${TEST_137_SETUP} will be run after Setup.

kw.name: Run Keyword
kw.doc: Executes the given keyword with the given arguments.

kw.name: New Browser
kw.doc: Create a new playwright Browser with specified options.

kw.name: New Context
kw.doc: Create a new BrowserContext with specified options.

kw.name: Test Teardown
kw.doc: test teardown You can define the Teardown variable with a keyword for tearing down all your tests. You can define the ${TEST_137_TEARDOWN} variable with a keyword for tearing down this specific test. If both are defined, Teardown will be run after ${TEST_137_TEARDOWN}.
